title: BRICS Leader Says Days of US Dollar-Centric World Are Over As Group Expands Trade in Alternate Currencies: Report
description:
African Ambassador and BRICS official Anil Sooklal says the glory days of the US dollar are in the rear view mirror. At a media briefing, the BRICS diplomat told reporters the group of economically aligned nations is shifting away from the world’s reserve currency, reports Reuters. Sooklal saysÂ BRICS, which is made up of Brazil, Russia, […]

The post BRICS Leader Says Days of US Dollar-Centric World Are Over As Group Expands Trade in Alternate Currencies: Report appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
